WorkItem.Description:
Dear Developers 
I need a code sample related windows services . 
I want  widows service code which triggers twice a day at set time say at 0800HRS and 2200 HRS daily. 
I have sleep and other methods but they are not consistent for my needs , I wish to run the certain functions in my service twice a day at said time.
WorkItem.Summary: Request of widows service code which triggers twice a day

Comments.Message: Schedule the Windows service using Windows scheduler at specific timings.
